phrases: Coming all the way out here, it is no wonder it is cold.
We are pretty far from Clarines.
We are in a hurry, so we can only take you partway.
Thank you for allowing me to travel with you and even ride with you.
I cannot believe you have to go all the way to Laxdo for an errand.
Court herbalists have it rough, too.
It is because I am still an apprentice.
And we often study outside, as well.
Speaking of which, when I told Lord Haruka that you passed,
But he said it with a sigh.
He is funny, is not he?
You can tell what he is thinking immediately.
No, it is the usual fort inspection.
Fort Laxdo is under my jurisdiction.
Well, I will leave you here.
It is cold, so do not wander around.
There is a lot that can be gained from being outside.
And the feelings we come to know from them...
Episode 5: This Path, the Crystallization of Premonition
I do not see anyone on watch.
We are from the royal guards!
Regular reports stopped coming, so we came to see what was going on.
Everyone inside the fort is sleeping.
It is still a trial period, though.
Come on, I have handed my reins to you.
This place has been possessed by a fearsome evil spirit!
One after another, everyone started to complain about their bodies feeling strange.
Like their bodies felt heavy, or their vision was going dark.
Most people seemed to lose their sense of balance.
The physician also fell sick while he was tending to the others.
We could not find the reason behind it, so it must be the work of an evil spirit...
However, I was in no state to go down the snowy road...
I will take a look inside.
What if something happens to you, as well, Your Highness?!
If that happens, then there is no point.
You did well to endure it until now.
Zen, you must come out before sunset.
Mitsuhide, stay outside and keep watch.
I want to avoid having everyone inside.
Normally, would not the master be waiting outside?
If it is some kind of sickness.
If we know where that sickness is coming from,
it will be better than going back empty-handed, though.
Is it all right not to stop him?
He is worried about the soldiers.
Mitsuhide, are not you a close aide of the prince?
I do not see anything out of the ordinary.
What if it really was an evil spirit?
If something like that really exists, I would like to try fighting it.
It does not seem like it would have anything to do with... this?
Seems the soldier earlier did not know, either.
Someone probably took advantage of this opportunity.
Shall we switch to bandit hunting?
We need to investigate the because and help the soldiers recover first.
What if we ask Shirayuki to come?
She might know something about what is happened to the soldiers.
I hope he can bring her before sunset.
Hey, Miss Kiki, do not tell me Mitsuhide does not tell Prince Zen his opinion?
You tell him what is important calmly, Miss Kiki,
but do not you think your partner's a little soft on him?
Did the physician prescribe the medicine?
But there were not enough medicinal herbs during this time.
In cold climates, the medicinal properties of the herbs are lower,
so a larger amount is necessary.
No, I was often outside keeping watch...
Sorry I am not much help...
Please let me know if there is anything I can do.
That will be a great help.
He looks like he is weakened considerably.
Zen, you need to go outside soon.
It will be bad if you pass out!
I will stay a little longer.
I said, that would be bad!
I do not like the cold!
Do you think I can leave by myself after calling you here?
If there was anything we could do together, then I would do it with you.
But that is not the case now.
I will try to do what I can to be of help.
Did not you say you would only stay until sunset?
Right now, you have to think of your own position.
Zen, good job keeping your stubbornness in check.
It is'because of what you said.
I know you are concerned about Shirayuki.
Do not those feelings show that that is how much you can depend on her?
But anyway, it was my first time hearing that you do not like the cold.
Are you okay lying down in a place like that?
To tell the truth, Mitsuhide's really the only one Zen listens to.
So that is why he does not say usually say anything.
It is not that he is being soft on him, huh?
Shirayuki, did you figure anything out?
Are you okay being up and about?
I rested for a while already.
I have not figured anything out yet...
Everyone had the same symptoms at the beginning,
but there is a difference in their symptoms now.
Is there a reason for that...?
But I did figure out what medicine the physician was using.
I thought I would prepare some with the medicines I bought in town-
It should not... start this soon...
Is it different depending on the person?
Shuka, you said you were often outside keeping watch, right?
That means, the reason must be inside the room...
The people furthest from the entrance have the worst symptoms...
I was just working too close to these.
The because was the firewood in the fireplace!
and if you keep breathing them in, they will start to have an effect.
According to Shuka, a band of travelers said they did not want to carry it while they traveled,
so they gave it to them for free.
I apologize for one thing after another!
Are you able to move around more easily now?
I will try to do what I can to be of help.
Will you stay here for a while?
I want to leave the soldiers to you.
To have everyone recovered this much in just a few days...
Yeah, apparently there is a band that uses the Laxdo area as their base.
I need a little more time to find out.
I have more intel about the town than you guys!
I want to take care of this with just us.
Because we cannot just keep relying on Shirayuki.
It is an infusion of medicinal herbs.
I-I do not like bitter things!
It has a lot of nutrients, you know.
I wonder if Prince Zen is embarrassed by this fort...
I am afraid he will keep his distance from us now...
He goes out with the patrols, talks to the older soldiers about the town,
and even listens to apprentices like me like he is having fun.
Even though I want to be of use to him...
He might not come here any longer.
I do not think you need to worry about that.
I think he keeps coming here for a reason.
I want to see Zen having fun here, too.
Next, I need to write the report... and prepare... medicine for the afternoon...
The soldiers have starting getting up!
You feel all right even when moving around?
Yeah, I am fine, I am fine!
You just want her to tend to you, do not you?
If you are going to make a complete recovery, then get to work!
I am leaving everyone to you!
All right, before I prepare the food...
I do not think I am getting enough sleep...
The master said not to go near her without permission...
I am Prince Zen's attendant right now.
You are not wary of me?
Why would I be after you saved me?
Miss, you are not feeling well, are you?
Even if you say that, I have to obligation to do as you say.
Then, I will owe you one.
She is not going to bring up the fact that I threatened her with an arrow?
That is fine, but tell me why you are hiding it.
That is why I just want it to end uneventfully.
What would I follow her for?
Nothing to note in the south?
We should probably go to the west tower to check things out, too.
Your Highness, we are gathering those who can move to go on patrol.
We cannot because more trouble than this.
We will fulfill our duties with everything we have, as well.
Oh right, Shuka, is there any medicine left?
No, Shirayuki made it in time for when people woke up.
We have three shifts right now, right?
Soldiers wake up every eight hours.
Close your eyes for a slow sixty seconds.
Do not open your eyes before time's up.
Who would have thought the firewood would work this well?
If we just wait for the right chance to sell the weapons,
we will make a ton of cash!
The ones who attacked the fort?
Who the hell are you guys?
We are soldiers from the castle.
It will not do for you to take other people's things without permission.
You call yourselves soldiers with such a tiny group?
You brought us a nice present!
I will not allow you to insult anyone here!
What, you playing at being friends?
I can love this country because I know those who live here.
Because Mitsuhide and Kiki are by my side,
I can look forward without forgetting my position.
Because there is someone I want to face,
I can decide not to become someone she would turn her back on.
I am not talking to you guys.
I wish he would say that about me, too.
Sorry it took so long for me to notice you were not feeling well.
As the person in charge, I was not paying enough attention.
But you know, if you had just said something,
I would have tried to come up with a way for you to not be overworked.
It is not a problem you need to deal with by yourself, Shirayuki.
Even if it were, do not hide it again.
Just because you are lying here like this
does not change the fact that we were all saved thanks to your hard work.
I did not thank you properly.
I am glad you were here, Shirayuki.
This time, you were my driving force...
To me, that is what you are, Zen.
Ever since I met you, over and over...
I am counting on you to operate as usual from now on.
Shirayuki, I will write you letters!
Thanks, I will look forward to them.
There is a lot that can be gained from being outside.
Lucky encounters with the people we meet...
And the feelings we come to know from them...
They give us so many lights that never fade...
He is become a good-for-nothing prince.
Episode 6: The Back Full of Meaning
